question: The 73<sup>rd</sup> Amendment of the Constitution provides for:
option1: two tier system of Panchayati Raj at block and district level
option2: three tier Panchayati Raj system at village, block and district level
option3: two tier Panchayati Raj system at village and district level
option4: four tier Panchayati Raj system at village, block, tehsil and district level
answer: three tier Panchayati Raj system at village, block and district level
explanation: Second option is the correct answer
